# Installing and loading the bayesplot package

## Installation

* To install the latest release from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=bayesplot):

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("bayesplot")
```

* To install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/stan-dev/bayesplot) using the **devtools** package:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools") # if necessary
devtools::install_github("stan-dev/bayesplot")
```

## Loading the package

The examples in the rest of this documentation assume **bayesplot** has already
been installed using one of the methods above.

* To load the package after installation:

```{r}
library("bayesplot")
```
